Breeding adult.description: Caspian Terns are larger and more robust than Elegant Terns. They also have a much thicker and redder bill than Elegant Terns, which have a thin orange bill.
Royal Terns are larger than Elegant Terns with a heftier bill. The cap on Royal Terns is less shaggy than it is on Elegant Terns.

Nonbreeding adult.description: Royal Terns are larger than Elegant Terns with a heftier bill. Nonbreeding adults have a smaller black band around the back of the head than Elegant Terns.

Breeding adult.description: Sandwich Terns are slightly smaller than Elegant Terns. They have a black bill year-round, whereas Elegant Terns have an orange bill during the breeding season and a yellowish bill when they are younger.
